title: [Client] Hextech Crafting Bug
body:
I was just crafting a hextech key and used it on a crate, and I got this ward with a bugged name. It is supposed to be the Riggle ward I'm pretty sure. It shows up as "**loot_name_ward_rental_49"

[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/9gj59c.png[/IMG]

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
